name: Spring Boot Microservices
description: Spring boot microservices is a practical implementation of spring boot microservices with spring cloud for api gateway impling a project structure capable of handeling complex functionality of software application

name: Movies Recomendation
description: Movies Recomendation is a React Native mobile application available for both Android and IOS build allowing usesrs to search and geater information about the popular Movies, TV shows, Drama and about there information along with cast information

name: Weather forcast App
description: Weather forcast App is a React Native mobile application available for both Android and IOS build allowing usesrs to get informed about the weather across the globe with forcast of upto 7 days

name: Blockchain Donation
description: Blockchain Donation is a DApp build over Solidity smart contract allowing users to donate vertual currency (Crypto) for better cause

name: Blockchain TODO
description: Blockchain Donation is a DApp build over Solidity smart contract and Hardhat, it helps users to save there information over the decentralise network allowing complete privecy and healps to staty put on the task which users have save for themeself

name: Course Management
description: Course management system is a fullstack project which solves the need of online learning using a proper learning platform which keeps track of usres learning process and alow admins and intsructor to check the overall courses and teachers record.

name: Simple Blog
description: Simple blog is a Spring boot thymeleaf project for showcasing diffrent types of blogs with categories through wich people can explore there thoughts and ides, it has an attractive Ui and easy to use fuctionality with login and register functionality.

name: Crypto Tracker
description: Crypto tracker is a 3rd party api integration projects which gives you inforation of cypto markey allowing you to see trends between dirrent type of cyto currency.

name: Spring Boot REST API
description: Spring boot REST API Project is a project for learning the easy doing thing on spring boot along with the project structure and JPA library making it easy to communicate over the database.
